items.name: Snakepit
explicitMods: 48% increased Spell Damage
12% increased Cast Speed
Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Chain
Left ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Fork
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells Chain +1 times
Right ring slot: Projectiles from Spells cannot Fork
Projectiles from Spells cannot Pierce
flavourText: They wrap around you
until your blood turns as cold as theirs.

items.name: Circle of Anguish
explicitMods: +26 to Strength
Adds 28 to 32 Fire Damage
+24% to Fire Resistance
72% increased Fire Damage while affected by Herald of Ash
Herald of Ash has 58% increased Buff Effect
flavourText: I condemned an innocent man to the pyres, but to admit this mistake is to condemn myself.
My only choice is to strive harder.

items.name: Replica Dragonfang's Flight
explicitMods: +3 to Level of all Fireball Gems
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
10% increased Reservation Efficiency of Skills
Items and Gems have 7% reduced Attribute Requirements
flavourText: "Did we make this? Why do we have no record of it?
We were warned that there would be consequences..."
- Administrator Qotra

items.name: Hrimnor's Resolve
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 90% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: 36% increased Fire Damage
119% increased Armour
+70 to maximum Life
+30% to Cold Resistance
100% chance to Avoid being Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
flavourText: Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments
explicitMods: 69% increased Duration of Ailments inflicted with Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 69% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal 22% more Damage with Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
40% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 13% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants accuracy and critical strike chance to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 20% increased Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies gain +93 to Accuracy Rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: 120% increased Minion Movement Speed
Minions have 20% increased Chill Effect
Minions have 20% increased Shock Effect
Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 26% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
52% increased Critical Strike Chance during Effect

135% increased Recovery rate

items.name: Shadows and Dust
explicitMods: 27% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+27% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
104% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
0.2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage

Rampage
flavourText: What is fear but a snuffed torch
and death in the wind?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Activates every second while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
10% increased Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 3.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills have 40% reduced Chaining range
Projectiles from Supported Skills have 4.8 metres maximum range

hybrid.secDescrText: Supports spell skills that have no reservation. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 35% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a wall of fire for a duration, which deals burning damage to everything in its area. Each enemy that enters the wall also receives a secondary burning debuff which persists for a short duration after leaving the wall. Any projectiles fired through the wall by you and allies deal added fire damage and apply the wall's secondary debuff on hit.
explicitMods: Deals 786.8 Base Fire Damage per second
Secondary Debuff Deals 2622.7 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Base secondary duration is 2.05 seconds
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
Wall will be 60 units long
Maximum 4 Flame Walls at a time
Projectiles which pass through the wall deal 83 to 125 Added Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt. After the immobilise expires, a debuff remains on the enemy for a duration, lowering their movement speed by an amount which lessens over time. The affected enemy will take increased damage from traps and mines until the debuff expires. Modifiers to spell damage do not affect this skill's damage.
explicitMods: Deals 16 to 22 Physical Damage
Traps do not Trigger at the end of their Duration
Trap lasts 4 seconds
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Locks enemy in place
Enemies take 25% increased Damage from Trap or Mine Hits
Enemies have 80% less Movement Speed when the Debuff starts
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
